productList.additionEnabled.title: Enable modification by customers
productList.additionEnabled.description: Check this box to let users modify (add, edit, or delete) a private product list.

productList.loginRequired.title: Login Required
productList.loginRequired.description: Check this box to require users to be logged in to modify a product list.

productList.listAddedText.title: List Added Text
productList.listAddedText.description: Message shown after a product list is created. Leave replacement variables $()
productList.listAddedText.default: Good! Your $(1) list was successfully created.

productList.listUpdatedText.title: List Updated Text
productList.listUpdatedText.description: Message shown after a product list is updated. Leave replacement variables $()
productList.listUpdatedText.default: Good! Your $(1) list was successfully updated.

productList.itemAddedConfirmationText.title: Item Added To List Confirmation Text
productList.itemAddedConfirmationText.description: Message shown after an item is successfully added to a product list
productList.itemAddedConfirmationText.default: Good! You added this item to your product list

productList.itemMovedConfirmationText.title: Item Moved Between Lists Confirmation Text
productList.itemMovedConfirmationText.description: Message shown after an item is moved between product lists. A link with the name of the product list is appended.
productList.itemMovedConfirmationText.default: Good! You successfully moved the item from this to

productList.itemAddedToCartConfirmationT.title: Item Added To Cart Confirmation Text
productList.itemAddedToCartConfirmationT.description: Message shown after an item add from a product list to the cart
productList.itemAddedToCartConfirmationT.default: Good! 1 item from your $(1) list was successfully added to your cart. You can continue to view your cart and checkout

productList.itemsAddedToCartConfirmation.title: Items Added To Cart Confirmation Text
productList.itemsAddedToCartConfirmation.description: Message shown after items are added from a product list to the cart
productList.itemsAddedToCartConfirmation.default: Good! $(0) items from your $(2) list were successfully added to your cart. You can continue to view your cart and checkout

productList.itemSavedForLaterConfirmatio.title: Item Added Confirmation Text
productList.itemSavedForLaterConfirmatio.description: Message shown after an item is successfully added to a product list
productList.itemSavedForLaterConfirmatio.default: Good! You saved the item for later. If you want to add it back to your cart, see below in Saved for later

productList.listTemplates.title: Lists Templates
productList.listTemplates.description: Predefined lists, a.k.a templates: Administrators can define predefined list of templates. New customers will have these template lists by default. This lists will be of type=predefined and they cannot be modified/deleted. Note: Associated record will be created only when the customer add some product to the list.

default.name: Saved for Later
default.description: This is for the cart saved for later items

default.name: Request a Quote
default.description: This is for the request a quote items

productList.templates.title: Display modalities for product list items
productList.templates.description: Display modalities for product list items
